page.title: 07 Communications.
page.content:
{Electricity}is the power which also enables the provision of the three main sources of communication:-
a) {Telephone b) {Television c) {Radio
The growth of these systems especially in the last twenty years has enabled the majority of homes to have independent means of communication with almost every other part of the world - at a cost! The addition of home{computers}in the last couple of years seems likely to allow the combination of{television}and {telephone}for exchange of information both visual and audible. Public {telephones}in cubicles are also available for those who do not have their own private{telephone.
